thread.title: Instagram Introduces Galleries - Instagram Releases New Multi-Photo Feature
thread.title_full: Instagram Introduces Galleries - Instagram Releases New Multi-Photo Feature

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Instagram Introduces Galleries - Instagram Releases New Multi-Photo Feature
text:
Instagram just unveiled a game-changing feature on the app: the introduction of gallery posts where you can put up to 10 photos and videos in one 'gram.
Swipe left through @badgalriri's most memorable hair transformations from 2017 back to 2010! (Go to ELLE.com for the full evolution)
A post shared by Elle Magazine (@elleusa) on Feb 22, 2017 at 8:02am PST
 To use it, start to upload a photo as you typically would. You'll have the option of selecting multiple photos, choosing their order, and applying the same filter to all of them.
